name: Name

verify_email_address: We sent you an email with an the verification link.
signin-description: Sign in, using your preferred method, or quickly create an account.
register_description: Join the community by using one of the method below.
welcomeSearch-paragraph: You are one click away, to borrow any books from a place near you, and its totally free!
welcomeHow-subtitle: Finding a book to borrow has never been easier.
welcomeHow-step1: Search for a specific book, or just browse available books near you
welcomeHow-step2: Select a book from the list of available title near you
welcomeHow-step3: Choose a date and time that suit you and send your request
welcomeHow-step4: Pick up your book, after received confirmation of your request
welcomeAdd-subheading: Give a second life to your books
welcomeAdd-paragraph: Be part of the community, and quickly add your books to our selection and give them a second life. Adding a book is very simple, just click the button below to find out more.
welcomeJoin-paragraph: Stay up to speed, with BooksBank News, features announcement, and carefully selected offers.
welcomeAbout-paragraph1: Booksbank is a community driven project, aimed at allowing everyone to be able to enjoy a nice read, by borrowing books that would otherwise sit on a shelf collecting dust.
welcomeAbout-paragraph2: The heart of booksbank it's YOU! This project could not be possible, if it wasn't for the thousants of community memebers that are happy to lent their
bookshelfAdd-paragraph: Give your book a second life, by simply adding them to your virtual library following 3 easy steps.
bookshelfAdd-steps-step1-description: Search out database with millions of books available
bookshelfAdd-steps-step2-description: Provide some quick details for users to know
bookshelfAdd-steps-step3-description: Review your information and add make the book available
bookshelfAdd-step2-description: Select the condition that best describe our book
bookshelfAdd-step3-description: Review the following information before adding your book
bookshelfAddNoBookshelfBanner-paragraph:
Your bookshelf need to be fully configured to be able to add books into it.
Click the link below to quickly complete the registration of your bookshelf
bookshelfSettings-timeslot-title: Choose your preferred time for the book to be picked up
libraryBorrow-noBooks: Why not tweet this or invite your friends to join and start thier own library?
libraryBorrow-noBooks-heading: There are still not enough books in your searched area!
libraryBorrow-searchOtherBooks: Other books available within your radius
libraryBorrow-timeslot-title: Available times to pick up. Please select at least 3 slots before continuing
sFooter-text: Finding a book to borrow has never been easier. Join our community members and start to read now from the comfort of your home.
